argument.name: Field_List
argument.description: A CR-LF delimited string in the format <fieldname>, width, decimals.

page.description: Visits all records and dumps field name + space used.
page.discussion: The <TBL>.FIELD_SPACE_USAGE() method scans all of the data in a table and reports the minimum size needed for each field. For example, if you have defined a character field with a size of 100 but none of the records in this field is longer than 40, then you can safely restructure your table and reduce this field to 40 characters. Note : The function returns 0 for the width of memo fields.

section.title: Example
section.description: This script was attached to a button on a form.
section.example: dim tbl as P dim answer as C tbl = table.current() answer = tbl.field_space_usage() ui_msg_box("Minimum Size for Each Field", answer)
